alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 29 at 8:06PM EST until December 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The Saint Johns River at Sanford is forecast to slowly fall while remaining within Minor Flood Stage until around this weekend. Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Minor flood impacts. For the St. Johns River...including Sanford...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1000 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Sanford. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Water encroaches on low lying roads, also pool enclosures and patios in the Stone Island area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EST Tuesday was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun St Johns River Sanford 5.5 5.8 Tue 7 pm 5.7 5.6 5.5 5.5 5.4 &&
